entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT, Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:27 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 08:19 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: N 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Blowing snow this morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 08:56 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 08:56 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 08:56 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016
